com.epoch.translations

Class PhraseTransln

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.translations.PhraseTransln
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppConstants, TranslnConstants

    public class PhraseTransln
extends Object
implements TranslnConstants
    Holds the translations of hardwired ACE phrases into a single language.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String[] allPhrases
      Holds all English phrases hardwired into ACE.
      String[] translations
      Holds the phrases' translations during a translation session.
      private String translatorId
      ID of the person doing the translating.

      • translate

        public static String translate(String phrase,
                               String[] languages)
        Gets translation of selected phrase, or returns the original (and stores it in the database) if the translation is not found.
        Parameters:
        phrase - a phrase to translate
        languages - languages that user has chosen in order of preference
        Returns:
        translation of the phrase into the most preferred language for which there is a translation

      • translate

        public static String translate(String phrase,
                               String[] languages,
                               boolean addNewPhraseToDB)
        Gets translation of selected phrase, or returns the original if the translation is not found.
        Parameters:
        phrase - a phrase to translate
        languages - languages that user has chosen in order of preference
        addNewPhraseToDB - whether to add a new English phrase to the database
        Returns:
        translation of the phrase into the most preferred language for which there is a translation

      • translate

        public static void translate(String[] phrases,
                             String[] languages)
        Gets translations of selected phrases for display into the most preferred language for which there is a translation. Modifies the original, leaving in English (and storing in the database) those phrases without translations.
        Parameters:
        phrases - phrases to translate
        languages - languages that user has chosen in order of preference

      • translate

        public static void translate(String[] phrases,
                             String[] languages,
                             boolean addNewPhrasesToDB)
        Gets translations of selected phrases for display into the most preferred language for which there is a translation. Modifies the original, leaving in English those phrases without translations.
        Parameters:
        phrases - phrases to translate
        languages - languages that user has chosen in order of preference
        addNewPhrasesToDB - whether to add new English phrases to the database

      • addEnglish

        public static void addEnglish(String... phrases)
        Adds English phrases to the database if they are not already in it.
        Parameters:
        phrases - English phrases

        public static void deleteEnglish(String phrase)
        Deletes an English phrase and all its translations from the database.
        Parameters:
